languages.text: "То, как он поступил с Ее Светлостью и ее родней, конечно, было делом жестоким и злодейским... Но и цель он искал великую, по плечу. Целый сектор пытался вырвать из лап злодейства, целую династию Вольных Торговцев. Надеюсь, что одно великое святотатство не затмит память о высшей цели его и прочих благих деяниях. В конце концов, он никогда не скрывал, что его душа запятнана не менее, чем у всех нас. Все грешны".

traits.locale_text: "То, как он поступил с Ее Светлостью и ее родней, конечно, было делом жестоким и злодейским... Но и цель он искал великую, по плечу. Целый сектор пытался вырвать из лап злодейства, целую династию Вольных Торговцев. Надеюсь, что одно великое святотатство не затмит память о высшей цели его и прочих благих деяниях. В конце концов, он никогда не скрывал, что его душа запятнана не менее, чем у всех нас. Все грешны".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "What he did to Her Ladyship and her kin was, of course, cruel and criminal... But he was pursuing a grand goal, a goal of his calibre. He was trying to wrest an entire sector, an entire Rogue Trader dynasty from the clutches of depravity. I hope that one great sacrilege does not taint the memory of his supreme goal and his other good deeds. After all, he never made a secret of having a blemished soul, just like the rest of us. None are unsullied."
languages.original_text: "То, как он поступил с Ее Светлостью и ее родней, конечно, было делом жестоким и злодейским... Но и цель он искал великую, по плечу. Целый сектор пытался вырвать из лап злодейства, целую династию Вольных Торговцев. Надеюсь, что одно великое святотатство не затмит память о высшей цели его и прочих благих деяниях. В конце концов, он никогда не скрывал, что его душа запятнана не менее, чем у всех нас. Все грешны".

traits.locale_text: "What he did to Her Ladyship and her kin was, of course, cruel and criminal... But he was pursuing a grand goal, a goal of his calibre. He was trying to wrest an entire sector, an entire Rogue Trader dynasty from the clutches of evil. I hope that one great sacrilege does not taint the memory of his supreme goal and his other good deeds. After all, he never made a secret of having a blemished soul just like the rest of us. Everyone is a sinner."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

He was trying to wrest an entire sector, an entire Rogue Trader dynasty from the clutches of depravity. I hope that one great sacrilege does not taint the memory of his supreme goal and his other good deeds. After all, he never made a secret of having a blemished soul, just like the rest of us. None are unsullied."

languages.text: “当然，他对库尔达女士与她的族人犯下了残忍而邪恶的罪行……但他这么做，是为了实现某个伟大的目标，某个超出他能力的目标。他渴望从腐化的魔掌中夺回整片星区，夺回整个行商浪人王朝。我希望这样的邪恶之举不会玷污他的崇高目标与其他善行，毕竟，他从来没有试图掩饰过他灵魂中的污点。他和我们一样，每个人都可能会犯错。”
languages.original_text: "What he did to Her Ladyship and her kin was, of course, cruel and criminal... But he was pursuing a grand goal, a goal of his calibre. He was trying to wrest an entire sector, an entire Rogue Trader dynasty from the clutches of depravity. I hope that one great sacrilege does not taint the memory of his supreme goal and his other good deeds. After all, he never made a secret of having a blemished soul, just like the rest of us. None are unsullied."

traits.locale_text: “当然，他对库尔达女士与她的族人犯下了残忍而邪恶的罪行……但他这么做是为了实现某个伟大的目标，某个超出他能力的目标。他渴望从邪恶的魔掌中夺回整片星区，夺回整个行商浪人王朝。我希望这样的邪恶之举，不会玷污他的崇高目标与其他善行。毕竟，他和我们一样，他从来没有试图掩饰过他灵魂中的污点。每个人都可能会犯错。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: 「彼が女帝と彼女の親族にしたことは、もちろん、残酷な犯罪行為です…ですが、彼には大きな目標がありました。大きな組織、つまり、ローグトレーダー王朝全体を、堕落の魔手から守ろうとしていた。彼は確かに神聖を汚したが、その一回だけで彼の素晴らしい目標やその他の善行の記憶までもが消されない事を、願っています。結局、彼は汚れた魂を隠さなかったのですから。私達と同じように。全員が、罪人なんです」
languages.original_text: "What he did to Her Ladyship and her kin was, of course, cruel and criminal... But he was pursuing a grand goal, a goal of his calibre. He was trying to wrest an entire sector, an entire Rogue Trader dynasty from the clutches of depravity. I hope that one great sacrilege does not taint the memory of his supreme goal and his other good deeds. After all, he never made a secret of having a blemished soul, just like the rest of us. None are unsullied."

traits.locale_text: 「彼が女帝と彼女の親族にしたことは、もちろん、残酷な犯罪行為です…ですが、彼には大きな目標がありました。大きな組織、つまり、ローグトレーダー王朝全体を、悪の手から救おうとしていた。彼は確かに神聖を汚したが、その一回だけで彼の素晴らしい目標やその他の善行の記憶までもが消されない事を、願っています。結局、彼は汚れた魂を隠さなかったのですから。私達と同じように。全員が、罪人なんです」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: «Lo que le hizo a milady y los suyos fue, sin lugar a dudas, cruel e inmoral... pero fue por un objetivo mayor, algo digno de su calibre. Intentaba arrancar de las garras de la depravación a un sector entero, a toda una dinastía de Comerciantes Independientes. Espero que ese sacrilegio no empañe la memoria de su objetivo y de sus otras buenas acciones. Después de todo, al igual que el resto de nosotros, nunca escondió sus imperfecciones. Nadie puede ser totalmente inocente».
languages.original_text: "What he did to Her Ladyship and her kin was, of course, cruel and criminal... But he was pursuing a grand goal, a goal of his calibre. He was trying to wrest an entire sector, an entire Rogue Trader dynasty from the clutches of depravity. I hope that one great sacrilege does not taint the memory of his supreme goal and his other good deeds. After all, he never made a secret of having a blemished soul, just like the rest of us. None are unsullied."

traits.locale_text: «Lo que le hizo a milady y los suyos fue, sin lugar a dudas, cruel e inmoral... pero fue por un objetivo mayor, algo digno de su calibre. Intentaba arrancar de las garras del mal a un sector entero, a toda una dinastía de Comerciantes Independientes. Espero que ese sacrilegio no empañe la memoria de su objetivo y de sus otras buenas acciones. Después de todo, al igual que el resto de nosotros, nunca escondió sus imperfecciones. Todos hacemos cosas malas».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Was er ihrer Ladyschaft und deren Untertanen angetan hat, war natürlich grausam und kriminell ... Doch er hat ein großes Ziel verfolgt, ein Ziel seines Kalibers. Er hat versucht, einen ganzen Sektor, eine ganze Freihändler-Dynastie den Klauen der Verkommenheit zu entreißen. Ich hoffe, dass ein großes Sakrileg die Erinnerung an sein übergeordnetes Ziel und seine anderen guten Zielen nicht beflecken wird. Schließlich hat er nie ein Geheimnis daraus gemacht, dass er eine Seele mit Makeln hatte, wie wir alle. Niemand ist rein."
languages.original_text: "What he did to Her Ladyship and her kin was, of course, cruel and criminal... But he was pursuing a grand goal, a goal of his calibre. He was trying to wrest an entire sector, an entire Rogue Trader dynasty from the clutches of depravity. I hope that one great sacrilege does not taint the memory of his supreme goal and his other good deeds. After all, he never made a secret of having a blemished soul, just like the rest of us. None are unsullied."

traits.locale_text: "Was er ihrer Ladyschaft und deren Untertanen angetan hat, war natürlich grausam und kriminell ... Doch er hat ein großes Ziel verfolgt, ein Ziel seines Kalibers. Er hat versucht, einen ganzen Sektor, eine ganze Freihändler-Dynastie den Klauen des Bösen zu entreißen. Ich hoffe, dass ein großes Sakrileg die Erinnerung an sein übergeordnetes Ziel und seine anderen guten Zielen nicht beflecken wird. Schließlich hat er nie ein Geheimnis daraus gemacht, dass er eine Seele mit Makeln hatte, wie wir alle. Jeder ist ein Sünder."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: « Ce qu'il a fait subir à Sa Seigneurie Chorda et à ses proches était d'une grande cruauté, bien sûr... mais il poursuivait un but à la hauteur de son grand calibre : libérer tout un secteur, toute une dynastie de libres-marchands des griffes de la dépravation. J'espère qu'un seul sacrilège, aussi grave soit-il, ne ternira pas la mémoire de son ultime dessein et de toutes ses bonnes actions. Il n'avait, après tout, jamais prétendu être parfait. Personne n'est parfait. »
languages.original_text: "What he did to Her Ladyship and her kin was, of course, cruel and criminal... But he was pursuing a grand goal, a goal of his calibre. He was trying to wrest an entire sector, an entire Rogue Trader dynasty from the clutches of depravity. I hope that one great sacrilege does not taint the memory of his supreme goal and his other good deeds. After all, he never made a secret of having a blemished soul, just like the rest of us. None are unsullied."

traits.locale_text: « Ce qu'il a fait subir à Sa Seigneurie Chorda et à ses proches était d'une grande cruauté, bien sûr... mais il poursuivait un but à la hauteur de son grand calibre : libérer tout un secteur, toute une dynastie de libres-marchands des griffes du mal. J'espère qu'un seul sacrilège, aussi grave soit-il, ne ternira pas la mémoire de son ultime dessein et de toutes ses bonnes actions. Il n'avait, après tout, jamais prétendu être parfait. Au bout du compte, ne sommes-nous pas tous des transgresseurs ? »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Leydi Hazretleri'ne ve soyuna karşı yaptıkları elbette ki zalimceydi, suçtu. Ancak ulu bir amaç uğrunaydı. Onun gibi birinin kalibresine yakışan bir amaç. Bütün bir sektörün, bütün bir Hür Tacir hanedanlığının ahlaksızlığın pençelerine düşmemesi için mücadele ediyordu. Umuyorum ki bu büyük hürmetsizliği, ulu amacının ve yaptığı işlerin anısını kirletmez. Nihayetinde o, biz geri kalanların aksine hiçbir zaman lekeli bir ruha sahip olduğunu gizlemedi. Kimse arı değildir."
languages.original_text: "What he did to Her Ladyship and her kin was, of course, cruel and criminal... But he was pursuing a grand goal, a goal of his calibre. He was trying to wrest an entire sector, an entire Rogue Trader dynasty from the clutches of depravity. I hope that one great sacrilege does not taint the memory of his supreme goal and his other good deeds. After all, he never made a secret of having a blemished soul, just like the rest of us. None are unsullied."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Hazretleri'ne ve soyuna karşı yaptıkları elbette ki zalimceydi ve bir suçtu. Ancak ulu bir amaç uğrunaydı. Onun gibi birinin kalibresine yakışan bir amaç. Bütün bir sektörün, bütün bir Hür Tacir handenalığının ahlaksızlığın pençelerine düşmemesi için mücadele ediyordu. Umuyorum ki işlediği büyük suç, onun ulu amacını ve yaptığı diğer iyi eylemlerin anısını kirletmez. Nihayetinde o, biz geri kalanların aksine, hiçbir zaman lekeli bir ruha sahip olduğunu gizlemedi. Kimse arı değildir."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04
